reviewText: Fantastic - the best of Mandarin DVDs for kids - parents will like it and learn too! Keeps your attention and increases knowledge of customs and proper pronunciation.

A word of caution: This is the second disc in a two-disc series that follows along with the textbook.  This series follows the story of Dou Dou and her newly acquired turtle.  The story is narrated by "Bei Bei" an animated talking turtle.
